# BEST BALL Summary/ Player Stats Website

## Our Warriors

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| results: hide


library(tidyverse)
library(nflverse)

load_player_stats(seasons = 2022)

player_pic <- load_player_stats(seasons = 2022) %>%
  select(c(3,6)) %>% 
  filter(player_display_name %in% c("Kyler Murray"
         ,"Kirk Cousins"
         ,"Marcus Mariota"
         ,"Tyreek Hill"
         ,"Mike Evans"
         ,"Mike Williams"
         ,"Christian Kirk"
         ,"Tyler Boyd"
         ,"Treylon Burks"
         ,"Austin Ekeler"
         ,"Kenneth Gainwell"
         ,"Cordarrelle Patterson"
         ,"Breece Hall"
         ,"Nyheim Hines"
         ,"J.K. Dobbins"
         ,"David Njoku"
         ,"Irv Smith Jr.")) %>% 
  distinct()
```
